pros: Online Teaching Options for those who need to remain remote.
cons: Transitioning to different management with larger umbrella college.

review_title: Politics and elitism, combined with a bit of inferiority complex
pros: If you fit exactly into the higher ed mold you can probably skate by without doing much.
cons: Ability to bully others while claiming moral high ground.

pros: Team work, being valued, self-direction, feel like you're contributing to a positive learning environment
cons: As with most higher education, jobs are competitive while salaries are low.

job_title: Veterans Benefits Coordinator in Concord, NH
pros: Workplace culture was great. Unwaivering committment to students.
cons: As with all public schools; salary, while good is limited

pros: The students - The students that attend GSC are amazing - they are driven and hungry for knowledge.  There is also little politics played within the system
cons: Lack of full time faculty position - Undergrad has no true ft faculty - thus the concern over curriculum continuity.  Salary - while GSC is the profit arm of the UNH system - they are underpaid - often by as much as 50% verse the other schools.  Talent costs ...

pros: Excellent work environment, flexible schedule, strong management
